title: [Question]How many days before commencement of 1st sem classes will we get a notification?
content:
I'm asking for btech classes.. 
One of my friend in bba got it 20 days before commencement? Will it be the same for us?

comments.body: I had called the admission office and was told that they will mail atleast 15 days prior to the commencement.
Ohh ohk! Thank you soo much!
depends but most probably 1 week or so
